biotools.summary: An interactive tool for geometric modeling of nerve fiber architectures in the brain | The fiber arcitecture constructor (FAConstructor) allows a simple and effective creation of fiber models based on mathematical functions or the manual input of data points. Models are visualized during creation and can be interacted with by translating them in the 3-dimensional space

bioschemas.name: FAConstructor
